structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

law.catch_line: Liability for falsely stating financial condition.
law.text: Any person who violates KRS 517.090 shall be personally liable to any person damaged by the violation for the amount of the damage. This section shall not release the principal for whom the person may have acted from any liability, but the person liable and the principal for whom he acted in violating this section shall be jointly and severally liable.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 314. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1213b-2.
